name: Festival Tycoon
description:
Festival Tycoon is a music festival management game with additional RTS game play elements.

The game starts with the build-part. Here, the player plans, organizes and manages the location layout, the bands, the line-ups, finances and so on.
Afterwards, the live-part starts. This is where the visitors arrive, and the festival is running. The player has to sort out disputes between visitors, handle arriving bands and make sure, everything is running smoothly.
